pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw:
Write comment as "Workaround a GMTK bug (include URL) that raises an error if the last number in a list given to `-loadAccRange` is greater than 9999. By sorting in reverse..."

So if we're unlucky and have a range where the smallest value happens to be 10000 we can still trigger this?
content.html:
Write comment as "Workaround a GMTK bug (include URL) that raises an error if the last number in a list given to -loadAccRange is greater than 9999. By sorting in reverse..."
